control.control:
Album group StackLayout(7, Horizontal, true) 720 550 920 left
38 Player.HasMedia
fadelabel Album label 0 #(L(170)) 10 150 left Label ff00bfff 45 2 ff000000
fadelabel Album value 0 #Play.Current.Album (#Play.Current.Year) 10 620 left LabelBold ffffffff 45 2 ff000000 8

Playing next group StackLayout(7, Horizontal, true) 770 550 960 left
38 Player.HasMedia
fadelabel Playing next 0 #(L(4541)) 10 200 left Label ff00bfff 45 2 ff000000
fadelabel Next track 0 #Play.Next.Track 10 60 left Label ff00bfff 45 2 ff000000 10
fadelabel Next title 0 #(iif(eq(#Play.Next.Title,''),'n/a','#Play.Next.Title')) 10 490 left LabelBold ffffffff 45 2 ff000000 10

CD Art Image fanarthandler image 55155 130 26 188 188 #fanarthandler.music.albumcd.play #fanarthandler.music.albumcd.selected yes yes Visible Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional ![string.equals(#currentplaytime,0:00)|string.equals(#currentplaytime,0:01)|string.equals(#currentplaytime,0:02)]+Player.HasMedia
